import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Cloud Account Status (OCI and Alibaba)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/cloud/status/{cloud_type}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Lists status messages of the specified cloud account.  \r\n\r\nThis request performs a cloud account on-boarding trial run. You can use this request to validate your parameters before \n you use [Add Cloud Account](/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/add-cloud-account).\n

## Request
